title: Nick Needs To Apologize To Bruce Greene - Kinda Funny Podcast (Ep. 208)
description:

Go to http://luminskin.com/kindafunny to get your free trial of Lumin Skin products.

Tim and Nick went on adventure with the amazing Bruce Greene...but Nick made one horrible mistake.
